column4: what do people here think the best linux bit torrent client is
im asking what do you use
what do the people here use
how do u get the ncurses interface for bittornado
`btdownloadcurses`, the bittornado package has a half dozen interfaces (bt[tab] [tab] )
give it a torrent file as an argument
do u mean in terminal and also as an argument shud it hav a dash before it

btdownloadcurses [torrentfile]
